item.title: Epic luring?!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Phaze One:

Banned for four weeks for intentional grief. Towards the coordinate checker, if it is an xray I am hoping that in your next screenshots it doesn’t appear otherwise you could be looking at a punishment.

Thanks, sending to solved then.

Read full topic

item.title: Epic luring?!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Krackkid, post:5, topic:449945”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=552843.msg4050948#msg4050948 date=1342500710]

[quote author=Krackkid link=topic=552843.msg4050937#msg4050937 date=1342500223]

Was he griefing prior to you asking? Otherwise, I see two people at fault here.
[/quote]Nope but if you wish to ban me I will like to add the reason there is coords in the upper corner I have xray installed, since I won’t lie.

Honesty - proving better then shitty Photoshop jobs since 2011.
[/quote]Well I won’t lie.

Do I know if he was greifing before hand nope, but he sure was ready when I asked him to.

and yes I have xray installed etc[/quote]
dude link

Read full topic

item.title: Epic luring?!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Krackkid, post:5, topic:449945”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=552843.msg4050948#msg4050948 date=1342500710]

[quote author=Krackkid link=topic=552843.msg4050937#msg4050937 date=1342500223]

Was he griefing prior to you asking? Otherwise, I see two people at fault here.
[/quote]Nope but if you wish to ban me I will like to add the reason there is coords in the upper corner I have xray installed, since I won’t lie.

Honesty - proving better then shitty Photoshop jobs since 2011.
[/quote]Well I won’t lie.

Do I know if he was greifing before hand nope, but he sure was ready when I asked him to.

and yes I have xray installed etc[/quote]

I’m unable to determine whether or not you’ve used x-ray or simply the coordinate system installed. I’ll give you a warning and switch to a different coordinate checker like a mini-map mod. The situation seems a bit odd so I’ll wait for other mod’s input.

Read full topic
